title: Hellfire Pass
creator_credit: Graham Chase, Geoffrey Barnes and Film Australia
brief_description: On Anzac Day 1987, Sir Edmund “Weary” Dunlop and a group of ex-servicemen from Australia, Britain and Holland returned to the infamous Thai-Burma railway to dedicate Hellfire Pass as a monument to those who died. This film is their journey.
creator_credit_for_label: Graham Chase, Geoffrey Barnes and Film Australia
